verses.verse: Now it happened in the <S%H7970>thirtieth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H2568>month,<s%> in the fifth of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> as I was <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1473>captives<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar,<s%> that the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> were <S%H6605>opened,<s%> and I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H4759>visions<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
In the <S%H2568>fifth<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> which was the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3112>Jehoiachin<s%>'s <S%H1546>captivity,<s%>

the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came expressly to <S%H3168>Ezekiel<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H941>Buzi,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar;<s%> and the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of Yahweh was there on <S%H3068>him.<s%>

I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H7307>behold,<s%> a stormy wind <S%H935>came<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> with <S%H784>flashing<s%> <S%H3947>lightning,<s%> and a <S%H5051>brightness<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H8432>it,<s%> and out of its midst as it were <S%H5869>glowing<s%> <S%H2830>metal,<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

Out of its <S%H8432>midst<s%> came the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of <S%H702>four<s%> living <S%H2416>creatures.<s%> This was their <S%H4758>appearance:<s%> <S%H2007>they<s%> had the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of a <S%H120>man.<s%>
<S%H259>Everyone<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6440>faces,<s%> and each <S%H259>one<s%> of them had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

Their <S%H7272>feet<s%> were <S%H3477>straight<s%> <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of their <S%H7272>feet<s%> was like the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of a <S%H5695>calf<s%>'s <S%H7272>foot;<s%> and they <S%H5340>sparkled<s%> <S%H5869>like<s%> <S%H7044>burnished<s%> <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

They had the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> under their <S%H3671>wings<s%> on their <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>sides;<s%> and the <S%H702>four<s%> of them had their <S%H6440>faces<s%> and their wings <S%H3671>thus:<s%>

their <S%H3671>wings<s%> were <S%H2266>joined<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> to <S%H269>another;<s%> they <S%H5437>didn't<s%> turn when they <S%H3212>went;<s%> each <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H5676>straight<s%> <S%H6440>forward.<s%>

As for the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of their <S%H6440>faces,<s%> they had the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H120>man;<s%> and the <S%H702>four<s%> of them had the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H738>lion<s%> on the right <S%H3225>side;<s%> and the <S%H702>four<s%> of them had the <S%H6440>face<s%> of an <S%H7794>ox<s%> on the left <S%H8040>side;<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> of them also had the <S%H6440>face<s%> of an <S%H5404>eagle.<s%>

Such were their <S%H6440>faces.<s%> Their <S%H3671>wings<s%> were <S%H6504>spread<s%> out <S%H4605>above.<s%> <S%H8147>Two<s%> wings of <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H2266>touched<s%> <S%H376>another,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> their <S%H1472>bodies.<s%>

Each <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H5676>straight<s%> <S%H6440>forward:<s%> where the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was to <S%H3212>go,<s%> they <S%H3212>went;<s%> they <S%H5437>didn't<s%> turn when they <S%H3212>went.<s%>

As for the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the living <S%H2416>creatures,<s%> their <S%H4758>appearance<s%> was like <S%H1197>burning<s%> <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H3940>torches:<s%> the fire went up and <S%H1980>down<s%> among the living <S%H2416>creatures;<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> was <S%H5051>bright,<s%> and out of the <S%H784>fire<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H1300>lightning.<s%>
The living <S%H2416>creatures<s%> <S%H7519>ran<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a flash of <S%H965>lightning.<s%>

Now as I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the living <S%H2416>creatures,<s%> <S%H259>behold,<s%> one <S%H212>wheel<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the living <S%H2416>creatures,<s%> for each of the <S%H702>four<s%> faces of <S%H6440>it.<s%>

The <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> and their <S%H4639>work<s%> was <S%H5869>like<s%> a <S%H8658>beryl:<s%> and the <S%H702>four<s%> of them had <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1823>likeness;<s%> and their <S%H4758>appearance<s%> and their <S%H4639>work<s%> was as it were a <S%H212>wheel<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> a <S%H212>wheel.<s%>
When they <S%H3212>went,<s%> they <S%H3212>went<s%> in their <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>directions:<s%> they <S%H5437>didn't<s%> turn when they <S%H3212>went.<s%>

As for their <S%H1354>rims,<s%> they were <S%H1363>high<s%> and <S%H3374>dreadful;<s%> and the <S%H702>four<s%> of them had their <S%H1354>rims<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5869>eyes<s%> all <S%H5439>around.<s%>

When the living <S%H2416>creatures<s%> <S%H3212>went,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> beside <S%H681>them;<s%> and when the living <S%H2416>creatures<s%> were lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> were lifted <S%H5375>up.<s%>

Wherever the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was to <S%H3212>go,<s%> they <S%H3212>went;<s%> there was the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> to <S%H3212>go:<s%> and the <S%H212>wheels<s%> were lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H5980>beside<s%> <S%H7307>them;<s%> for the spirit of the living <S%H2416>creature<s%> was in the <S%H212>wheels.<s%>

When those <S%H3212>went,<s%> these <S%H3212>went;<s%> and when those <S%H5975>stood,<s%> these <S%H5975>stood;<s%> and when those were lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> were lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H5980>beside<s%> <S%H7307>them:<s%> for the spirit of the living <S%H2416>creature<s%> was in the <S%H212>wheels.<s%>

Over the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the living <S%H2416>creature<s%> there was the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of an <S%H7549>expanse,<s%> <S%H5869>like<s%> the <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H7140>crystal<s%> to look <S%H5186>on,<s%> stretched forth over their <S%H7218>heads<s%> <S%H4605>above.<s%>

Under the <S%H7549>expanse<s%> were their <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H3477>straight,<s%> the <S%H802>one<s%> toward the <S%H269>other:<s%> each <S%H376>one<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> which <S%H3680>covered<s%> on this <S%H2007>side,<s%> and every <S%H376>one<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> which <S%H3680>covered<s%> on that <S%H2007>side,<s%> their <S%H1472>bodies.<s%>

When they <S%H3212>went,<s%> I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of their <S%H3671>wings<s%> like the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> like the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> a <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H1999>tumult<s%> like the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of an <S%H4264>army:<s%> when they <S%H5975>stood,<s%> they let <S%H7503>down<s%> their <S%H3671>wings.<s%>
There was a <S%H6963>voice<s%> above the <S%H7549>expanse<s%> that was over their <S%H7218>heads:<s%> when they <S%H5975>stood,<s%> they let <S%H7503>down<s%> their <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

<S%H4605>Above<s%> the <S%H7549>expanse<s%> that was over their <S%H7218>heads<s%> was the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of a <S%H3678>throne,<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a <S%H5601>sapphire<s%> <S%H68>stone;<s%> and on the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the <S%H3678>throne<s%> was a <S%H1823>likeness<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> on it <S%H4605>above.<s%>

I <S%H7200>saw<s%> as it were <S%H5869>glowing<s%> <S%H2830>metal,<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%> it all <S%H5439>around,<s%> from the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of his <S%H4975>waist<s%> and <S%H4605>upward;<s%> and from the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of his <S%H4975>waist<s%> and <S%H4295>downward<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> as it were the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> and there was <S%H5051>brightness<s%> around <S%H5439>him.<s%>

As the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H7198>rainbow<s%> that is in the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H1653>rain,<s%> so was the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> all <S%H5439>around.<s%> This was the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> When I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H5307>it,<s%> I fell on my <S%H6440>face,<s%> and I <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of one that <S%H1696>spoke.<s%>
